TextView.android:text: The Department of Electronics and Communication Engineering at Acharya Nagarjuna University has a Top-Level quality assessment rating for teaching, and reputation for research. It was established in the year 2009 with the intent of raising highly qualified Engineers and Researchers who can make substantial contribution to the field of Electronics and Communication Engineering. The course was structured as per the need of industries. department is offering UG, PG courses. Also department is offering Ph.D program in different thrust areas. Department is headed by Prof P. Siddaiah who has rich experience of 25 years in teaching and 15 years in research in the area of Antennas.
